front.title: Presence Information Data Format for IMPP

abstract.t: This document is the output from the PIDF team working on thedefinition of the Presence Information Data Format for conveyingPRESENCE INFORMATION between PRESENTITIES, PRESENCE SERVICE andWATCHERS on top of the PRESENCE INFORMATION TRANSPORT PROTOCOL of theIMPP set of protocols. It describes the current status of discussionon the IMPP mailing list in relation to the scope of PIDF as well asits concrete format. The discussion is on-going at present andfuture versions of this Internet-Draft will further specify theconcrete format of PIDF in conformance with the IMPP RequirementsRFC.
